title: Tren linh vuc tu tuong - van hoa: Giu ban sac, mo tam nhin
lead: Phat trien con nguoi toan dien can song hanh giua gia tri truyen thong va nang luc hoi nhap van hoa hien dai.

sections.heading: Dinh huong
items: Thanh nien can biet chon loc tinh hoa van hoa the gioi, dong thoi giu vung he gia tri dan toc.
Giao duc tham my, dao duc so va trach nhiem cong dan la ba tru cot de tranh lech chuan.

sections.heading: Nhiem vu trong giai doan moi

items.title: Song dep
items.description: Ton trong su khac biet, hanh xu nhan van va biet chia se trach nhiem xa hoi.

items.title: Hoc su
items.description: Hieu biet lich su dan toc de cuong co ban linh va niem tu hao quoc gia.

items.title: Sang tao van hoa
items.description: Bien gia tri truyen thong thanh san pham noi dung moi, de tiep can gioi tre.

sections.heading: Minh chung hien dai
sections.label: HIEN DAI
sections.text: Nhi?u du an truyen thong do sinh vien thuc hien da lan toa lich su, am nhac, my thuat Viet Nam tren nen tang so.
